page.title: 06A nursery,Holbeach Hurn
page.content: Mr.John Hardy owns a nursery in the middle of Holbeach Hurn.We went to see it.We saw and tasted the strawberries he was packing.7 people were working on that,mostly his own family.We also saw potatoes and courgettes.The other crops were all flowers-lilies,iris,pinks and liatris.Mr. Hardy has 7 glasshouses and one polythene tunnel.He has an oil fired boiler for winter heating and a mains water tank for irrigation.There is a packing shed and cold store.Mr.Hardy takes his produce into Holbeach and from there it goes to market in Manchester and London. Mr.Hardy has 5 beehives.In July there were about 300,000 bees.He sells his honey from the nursery and a local health food shop.He uses fungicide spray but not insecticide as this would kill his bees.
